General.Name: Soosan Heavy I
General.Description: Soosan Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells hydraulic breakers in South Korea. It also provides truck-mounted, truck, and stationary cranes; drill rigs; special purpose machinery, such as pedestal boom systems and ANFO charger trucks; and rods. Soosan Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
